about_the_game:
Experience a thrilling sci-fi racer with StarBoost that redefines gravity: Master 360° action, high-speed flight, and intense parcour to prove your skills and become the Intergalactic Champion. Pick your Racing Captain, qualify for the tournament, and race to the top!

Boost, strafe, survive!

From agile space fighters to precision parcour artists, adapt to the challenges ahead. Dodge asteroids, blast rivals into obstacles, and stay ahead of the pack!

360° Action Racing & Limitless Parcours

The racetracks are designed to challenge your dexterity and reflexes. 360° degree action racing offers countless opportunities for very unique racing experiences. Switch between Free Flight for exploration or Lane Magnetism to gain speed and precision.

Space Battle & Factions

Climb the ranks and attract rival factions—each offering unique racing contracts, upgrades, and storylines. Your choices impact the world, shaping your path in the tournament.

Fleet & Powerups

Win races to gain more money and be able to buy other racing ships. Upgrade your racer, unlock powerups, and customize your loadout to fit your playstyle—whether you're a collector, a street racer, or a fighter.

A Reactive World

Your actions have consequences. Do you keep the track clean, or leave wreckage behind, altering future races? The tournament evolves based on your playstyle.

Explore & Discover

Seek hidden shortcuts, strategic items, and alternate routes. There’s always a choice—but which path leads to victory?

Win the tournament. Unlock new planets. Conquer the galaxy.

Wishlist Now – StarBoost launches into Early Access mid-2025!

Support development by wishlisting on here Steam!

name: StarBoost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space

short_description: Boost, strafe, survive! Test your skill and reaction speed in this action-packed sci-fi racing game. Experience thrilling 360° parcour racing on your path to becoming the intergalactic champion. Be fast, make risky jumps, blasts and fight your way to the top.Can you win the Tournament?
